About This Page

The "My Friends Statuses" page displays status updates from all friends of the currently logged in user. Any private status updates from users that are NOT reciprocal friends will be excluded.

It makes use of the following function:

  • Friends:Status WITHOUT member_id="" parameter, so it displays all friends' statuses.
